content: I'll definitely check out some of those meetups and events. I've been enjoying discussing these topics with my friend at the bookstore, and it would be great to meet more people who share my interests. By the way, do you have any recommendations for apps or online platforms that can help me reduce my environmental impact or live more sustainably? I've been trying to cut down on my screen time, and I think it would be great to find tools that can help me live more eco-friendly.
